LanguageData.FluffyTabs.Name: Name
LanguageData.FluffyTabs.NameColumnTip: Click to sort by name.\nRight-click to sort by game order.
LanguageData.FluffyTabs.WorkPrioritiesDisclaimer:
The default work priorities window allows you to change default priorities of work types (cooking, constructing, etc.), and the activities within them (carry materials, build, etc.).

DISCLAIMER:
 - It is entirely possible to bring your colony to a grinding halt by carelessly changing priorities. Use the button on the top right of this dialog to return to the vanilla default priorities.
LanguageData.FluffyTabs.CurrentJobColumnTip: Current activity\n\nClick to sort by activity
LanguageData.FluffyTabs.CurrentMoodColumnTip: Current mood\n\nClick to sort by mood
LanguageData.FluffyTabs.CreateFavouritesDialog: Create a new favourite from the current work settings of {0}.

LanguageData.FluffyTabs.24HourModeTip: Should times be shown in 12h (noon/9p.m.) or 24h (12:00, 21:00) mode?
LanguageData.FluffyTabs.MaxPriorityTip: How many levels of priority should we use? (Limited to between 4 and 9)
